name: Hostage Protocol
description:
In Hostage Protocol you play as a hostage negotiator.

The crisis at the bank has gotten out of control and now you have to disable all the electronic locks in a series of mini games. Simultaneously you must listen to the terrorist's demands and try to stall him to buy yourself more time to hack the locks.

This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2020.

Art assets used:

https://opengameart.org/content/free-keyboard-and-controllers-prompts-pack

https://opengameart.org/content/game-boy-platformer-tileset-character
